message:
I would like to handle an exception in a callback and terminate TCP connection (I try to use HttpContext.Abort() method to abort connection).
On my local machine which uses Kestrel, error handling works well and browsers show 'Network error'.
But if try to handle an exception on cloud (Azure) and abort the connection, then it just closes (does not abort) the connection and returns corrupted archive.
Worth to mention: Response headers include 'Transfer-Encoding: chunked'.

Any ideas what I'm doing wrong? Thanks
